name: 12Games12Weeks - 3 - 2D Platformer
description:
3nd Game for my #12Games12Weeks Challenge - A 2D Platformer. Making 12 Minimal Viable Product level games in 12 weeks. Challenge information here: https://12games12weeks.blogspot.com/

  • Controls:
    • Keyboard/mouse:
      • WASD or Arrow keys to move
      • Space to Jump
      • esc for menu
    • X-box (compatible) controller
      • Left Stick to move
      • A to Jump
      • Start for menu
